channel.title: World 2 finalization
channel.description:
Alright, so most of you will recall the world 2 thread I made not so long ago. It basically asked for your opinion on what world 2 should consist of and so forth. I've read the thread and have gathered that world 2 should/will contain the following:
[ul][li]PVP on at night[/li] [li]Border (1000x1000?) [/li][li]anti xray mod (no xraying!)[/li] [li]Creeper explosions on[/li] [li]split inventories for world one and two![/li][/ul]
That's all I think, this is what the world would be like (Unless I've forgotten anything). So, I say for the last time. Would you guys like anything changing/adding?
What is your opinion on LWC being in this world?

item.title: World 2 finalization
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Nah, I may like PVP but I wouldn’t go as far as power abusing to get at others chests, even if I hated everything you ever did. Besides, I would probably settle down on this new world instead of constant pvping.

I still think unlimited chests isn’t worth it though, five is more than enough.

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 finalization
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:38, topic:414192”]Anyone that makes a chest boundary has WAY too much time on their hands. And a report will easily solve the issue, its faster to break them than than make them ;)[/quote]well last time we had lwc the staff couldn’t remove protected chests. my city was full of them because people would play for a day and never come back online.

staff could have permission to destroy protected chests, but inb4 tom raids me.

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 finalization
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:36, topic:414192”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=516153.msg3755685#msg3755685 date=1316428457]

I don’t really see what’s wrong with infinite, I thought we were trying to promote people working together, not raiding?

Some people use teamwork in raiding.

I vote for 5.

I think 5 is good too.

if ur going to have inf. might as well keep residence. all somoene has to do is create chest locks to form a boundary where players cant raid.

5 is a good limit

the whole point of world 2 is to not have residence and have raiding at night…
[/quote]exactly, so having infinite locks would defeat the purpose of raiding again because people could make chest boundaries.[/quote]

there is a thing called reporting

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 finalization
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:31, topic:414192”]bow takes down half of the hp bar with 1 charged shot(no armor on). lol, thats still a bit 2 much considering how easy arrows are.

does bow slow movement when pulling back the string?[/quote]
U have to stand still I believe… and yes there is a delay for pulling the string back, you can hear it. If someone is sprinting at you, then you may not have the advantage. But a team of 2+ archers could ruin a place.

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 finalization
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’d be handy to be able to look at a real scene to see how bad a situation is, it’s always better to be able to see things first hand than rely on pictures only (which can easily be edited). It’s not ‘required’ really, just an idea.

Read full topic

item.description:

Do moderator’s need to teleport? I thought the screenshots of proof were working good enough?
[/quote]

half the people on the server dont even know what a forum is so they dont report stuff[/quote]

100% of the people on the server know what a forum is, because they have to register here and set a minecraft name in their profile. If they don’t report, then nothing can be done anyway.
